title: Attraction
content_html:
Inspiration

We'd like to train people's intuitions about the invisible forces of magnetic fields

What it does

It's a short VR experience for seeing magnetic fields.

How I built it

We use Unreal Engine and Vive

Challenges I ran into

Making it a game is not easy. Visualizing with math and vector field is tricky.

Accomplishments that I'm proud of

Magnetic fields look really great in VR

What I learned

There are still lots fun eletromagnetic interaction we have not covered.

What's next for Attraction

We will see...
content_md:
## Inspiration


We'd like to train people's intuitions about the invisible forces of magnetic fields


## What it does


It's a short VR experience for seeing magnetic fields.


## How I built it


We use Unreal Engine and Vive


## Challenges I ran into


Making it a game is not easy. Visualizing with math and vector field is tricky.


## Accomplishments that I'm proud of


Magnetic fields look really great in VR


## What I learned


There are still lots fun eletromagnetic interaction we have not covered.


## What's next for Attraction


We will see...
